traits.Brave: The half-dragon has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
traits.Brute: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the half-dragon hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.Multiattack: The half-dragon makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.
actions.Spear: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. and range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
actions.Shield Bash: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15+1d6 + 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.Fire Breath (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The half-dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
